item.title: Local File test
item.description: Jupyter Notebook function notebook_onload(obj) { var bg = window.getComputedStyle(document.body, null)['background-color'] obj.style.height = obj.contentDocument.body.scrollHeight + 'px'; obj.contentDocument.body.style.backgroundColor = bg; } Image
